name: Element
description: Elemental affinity spectrum from fire to ice

name: Power
description: Entity's power level from newly emerged to legendary

name: Leadership
description: Role in social hierarchy from follower to leader

name: Accessibility
description: How accessible a location is, from hidden to central

name: Safety
description: Danger level from dangerous to safe

name: Structure
description: Organizational structure from chaotic to organized

name: Reach
description: Visibility and influence from secretive to influential

name: Autonomy
description: Political spectrum from authoritarian to libertarian
